name: Money Collect
description:
In the game you need to collect money bags that will fall from above. try to collect as much money bags as you can!

-------------------------------------------

minimum requirements:  windows 7 / 8 /10 or  OS X 10.7+ , PowerPoint 2007+

Recommended Requirements: windows 10 or macOS 10.15 , PowerPoint 2016+

remember, the game is in early access ,a lot has not been added and there are many bugs, thanks for understanding!

-------------------------------------------

Want to play most of our games? Download PowerPoint Viewer!

bugs? you can report! try to use our new feedback site! :
